@hkfp Nothing about gaining hearts! 
Is just IMPOSITION, whether your like it or not; whether is against two years of global #COVID19 experience, or not.
When have you seen that culturally is about "gaining hearts"??? 🙄
😂.
@hkfp This is the sort of legislation you get from a government intent on bullying, coercing and terrifying the public. One that faces no opposition but is terrified of the people.

@hkfp "Our government is apparently helpless to stop millionaires holding parties [...], where invited senior officials can gather in defiance of Covid restrictions. [But] faced with 3 domestic helpers sharing the same piece of cardboard under a Central flyover, it swings into action."
@hkfp She only needs to win the heart of one man only.
@hkfp She must be so popular. Cant go out because her people love her soooo much.
